# AVAudioVoiceProcessingSpeechActivityEvent.started

**Case**

Indicates the start of speech activity.

## Declaration

```swift
case started
```

## Events

- **AVAudioVoiceProcessingSpeechActivityEvent.ended**: Indicates the end of speech activity.

items.description: Indicates the end of speech activity.
items.name: AVAudioVoiceProcessingSpeechActivityEvent.ended
